ComicInfo.Title: Hellfire by the Numbers
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Oblivion forces invade Nacht Island and slay all the human occupants. The battle is swift, decisive, and bloody.
Meanwhile Thor, Vortex, Annihilator, and Red Dragon launch a hit and run strike using the Bifrost bridge to teleport them quickly to the Oblivion planet. Thor and Red Dragon make mincemeat of the opposition and Vortex records the venture on videotape to boost the morale of the Super Nation. They also manage to take home a prisoner, who unbeknownst to them is "Lady Mary". Lord Oblivion mysteriously remarks that this is actually a good thing....
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 13:30:58. [CVDB34824]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill Willingham, Mike Leeke, Neil Trais, Tony Akins
ComicInfo.Characters: Ambrose, Annihilator, Cold Mary, Commander Chaos, Holocaust, Lord Oblivion, Monolith, Morningstar, Red Dragon, Thor, Vortex
ComicInfo.Locations: Asgard, Bermuda Triangle, Bifrost, Nacht Island, Oblivion
